attributes.action: Hold a public national inquiry into grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: The Government need to get a defined action plan to resolve this issue once and for all and expose those that were complicit in failing to support vulnerable children.
attributes.background: Hold a full public national inquiry into grooming gangs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
